summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定如何繪製每條虛線的端點。

value.span: 這個設定會套用至每一虛線的兩端點。

span.span: This setting applies to both ends of each dash.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供一組預先定義的虛線模式。The class provides a set of predefined dash patterns. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性建立文字底下為虛線。The following example shows how to use the property of a to create a dashed line under text. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用和屬性來建立其中一端的筆觸與另一端的筆劃的三角形端圓角的端點。The following example shows how to use the and properties to create a rounded end on one side of a stroke and a triangular end on the other side of the stroke. MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MiterLimit { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MiterLimit : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定限制，將斜接面長度比例限制為這個畫筆之 的一半。

span.span: Gets or sets the limit on the ratio of the miter length to half this pen's .

value.span: 限制，將斜接面長度比例限制為畫筆之 的一半。

span.span: The limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the pen's .

value.span: 這個值一律是大於或等於 1 的正數值。

span.span: This value is always a positive number greater than or equal to 1.
The default value is 10.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斜接角是一個結合斜角兩個介面的每個加入至表單的角。A miter is a joint made by beveling each of two surfaces to be joined to form a corner. 當兩個線段符合銳角時，斜接角可能會超出線條的粗細畫路徑。When two line segments meet at a sharp angle, the miter may extend beyond the thickness of the line that strokes the path. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來限制建立兩個直線線段的邊角的大小。The following example shows how to use the property to limit the size of a corner created by two line segments. [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#PenMiterLimitExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/PenMiterLimitExample.xaml#penmiterlimitexamplewholepage)] 下圖顯示這個程式碼範例會產生。The following illustration shows what this code example produces. ![顯示 MiterLimit 範例。夾角會遭裁切。](~/add/media/graphicsmiterlimit.png "顯示 MiterLimit 範例。夾角會遭裁切。")![Shows MiterLimit example. Corner formed is cut.](~/add/media/graphicsmiterlimit.png "Shows MiterLimit example. Corner formed is cut.")

summary.span: 取得或設定由這個 所產生之筆劃的粗細。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 寬度是相對於圖形這個畫筆與相關聯的幾何。Thickness is relative to the geometry of the shape associated with this pen. 負數的值會視為好像他們是正數。Negative values are treated as though they were positive. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
